++Puma Man
His skin was reddish, and he wore bangles of gold around his knees and upper arms. His head was that of a black puma, and its pelt covered his upper chest and his back. Several peacock feathers were strung on a cord around his neck. He was naked, and he carried a wooden flute with several small peacock feathers attached to the mouth.
*Consort of* [Hawk Woman]
